sm::eod::io::GenericSerializableCompressorEncoderFactory

GenericSerializableCompressorEncoderFactory Class Reference

#include <genericserializablecompressorencoderfactory.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Interface for an encoder factory.

Creates encoders for nodes within a tree.

Definition at line 55 of file genericserializablecompressorencoderfactory.h.

SerializableCompressorEncoder* newEncoder ( const StreamKey &  key  )  const

Returns a new encoder for key.

Parameters:
key The node within tree that needs to be encoded
Returns:
An encoder instance or NULL if the key cannot be handled. Ownership of the instance is transferred to the caller.

void registerEncoder ( const Key &  key,
CreatorImpl  creator,
int  linger = DO_NOT_LINGER 
)

Registers an encoder with a creation functor.

If the codec id was previously registered it is overwritten.

Parameters:
key The codec id.
creator The functor(SerializableCompressorEncoder*(void)) for creating the decoder.
linger To be documented.
Precondition:
creator is not NULL.

Definition at line 85 of file genericserializablecompressorencoderfactory.h.

void registerEncoder ( const Key &  key,
int  linger = DO_NOT_LINGER 
)

Registers a decoder via its type.

The default constructor is used to initialize the encoder. If the codec id was previously registered it is overwritten.
